label.label: First line of text in attribute, with translations in label elements
Italian for 1st line
French for 1st line
Second line of text, without any translation in original file.
Third line of text, as a label subelement
Italian for 3rd line
French for 3rd line

label.text: Fourth line of text, as a text subelement

label.label: Fifth line of text, as only a label subelement without an attribute

label.text: Sixth line of text, as only a label subelement without an attribute

display.tooltip: Sets functions to follow base address or consist address
Imposta se comandi Funzioni seguono Indirizzo di Base o Indirizzo Consist
